name: Cake Blast (itch)
description:
Cake Blast is a 3D Unity Shooter game where you control a cute muffin character that must defend their land from the evil cake baddies. 

You will need to use a variety of weapons to defend yourself from the ravenous cake monsters. You must save muffin kind and ensure that you don't get devoured.

This is a student project that was made by me for my game content course. Enjoy.

-CONTROLS-

MOVE = [WASD]

SHOOT = [SPACEBAR]

INTERACT = [LEFT CLICK]

READ DIALOGUE = [E]

SKIP DIALOGUE = [R]
